text: I’m experiencing an issue with a page we created last week. It’s a custom page and custom template, etc. I’ve set up a HubDB table to create products on that is being pulled into the page with Hubl filters I’ve set up. Everything appears as if it is working.

Looking at the page in edit mode shows the items populating the list. Previewing the page shows the items in the list. Looking at the preview in a separate window shows everything the way it should be.

Viewing the live page only shows some of the demo content I’d added last week. I’m not sure I understand why the data would be working and populating until the page is published.
Thanks for any pushes in the right direction. I’m not even sure what to Google in order to find the answer.

I fixed it I guess? I had to break the query in the template and then fix it. Like it wasn’t updating the query for some reason. I was playing around local editing and the --watch command. I wonder if that has something to do with it? Doesn’t make sense that it would but :man-shrugging:
